resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157337</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157337</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3020</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Online Exhibitions- "To Build and To Be Built"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufzubauen und aufgebaut zu werden 
Onlineausstellungen ""</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expositions en ligne "à construire et à 
construire"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exhibitions- em linha "a construir e a ser 
construídos"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mostre in linea "da costruire e da costruire"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε απευθείας σύνδεση εκθέσεις - "για να χτίσουν και 
για να χτιστούν"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Exposiciones en línea "a construir y que se 
construirán"</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is The Contribution of a few Holocaust Survivors to the State of Israel .In video and text it presents the personal stories and the struggle of some of the survivors to come to Israel, to rebuild their lives,</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">holocaust education</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">survivors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">State of Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist der Beitrag einiger Holocaust 
Überlebender zum Zustand des Israel In Bildschirmes und des Textes, 
die er die persönlichen Geschichten und den Kampf von einigen der 
Überlebenden darstellt, um nach Israel zu kommen, ihre Lebensdauern 
umzubauen,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est la contribution de quelques Holocauste 
survivants à l'état de vidéo et de texte d'In de l'Israel qu'il 
présente les histoires personnelles et la lutte de certains des 
survivants pour venir en Israel, pour reconstruire leurs vies,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é a contribuição de alguns sobreviventes 
de Holocaust ao estado do vídeo e do texto que do In de Israel 
apresenta as histórias pessoais e o esforço de alguns dos 
sobreviventes para vir a Israel, para reconstruir suas vidas,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è il contributo di alcuni superstiti di 
Holocaust al Dichiarare del video e del testo che del In dell'Israele 
presenta le storia personali e la lotta di alcuni dei superstiti per 
venire nell'Israele, ricostruire le loro vite,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι η συμβολή μερικών επιζόντων ολοκαυτώματος
στο κράτος του Ισραήλ. Στο βίντεο και το κείμενο 
παρουσιάζει τις προσωπικές ιστορίες και την προσπάθεια μερικοί 
από τους επιζόντες για να έρθει στο Ισραήλ, για να 
επανοικοδομήσει τις ζωές τους,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ésta es la contribución de algunos 
sobrevivientes de Holocaust al estado del vídeo y del texto del In de
Israel que presenta las historias personales y la lucha de algunos de 
los sobrevivientes para venir a Israel, reconstruir sus vidas,</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">holocaust Ausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Überlebende</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zustand von Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">holocauste éducation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">survivants</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">État de l'Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrução do holocaust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sobreviventes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estado de Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">formazione del holocaust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">superstiti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dichiari dell'Israele</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκπαίδευση ολοκαυτώματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επιζόντες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κράτος του Ισραήλ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">educación del holocaust</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sobrevivientes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estado de Israel</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <status>

            <value>final</value>
          </status>
